To create a Chattea account:

2. Click 'Register' or 'Sign Up'
3. Enter your email and password

5. Log in and start using Chattea!

api_send_message.en:
To send a message via REST API:
```
POST /api/v1/messages/send
Headers: Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
Body: {
  "phone": "+628123456789",
  "message": "Hello!"
}
```
See full documentation at docs.chattea.com/api

warmup_info.en:
WhatsApp Warmup explained:

ğŸ”¥ What is Warmup?
A gradual process to make a new WhatsApp account look like a normal user, not a bot/spammer.

â“ Why Warmup?
- WhatsApp has anti-spam algorithms
- New accounts blasting immediately = red flag
- Warmup = gradually build reputation
- Reduces ban risk by 80%+

ğŸ”§ How it works:
1. Instances A & B chat with each other (auto)
2. Simulate natural conversations
3. Delays between messages (human-like)
4. Gradually increase volume

â±ï¸ Duration:
- Minimum: 7 days
- Recommended: 14 days
- Intensive: 30 days

ğŸ“Š Results:
- Higher account trust score
- Better delivery rate
- Minimal ban risk

Best practices:
âœ… Warmup all new accounts
âœ… Donâ€™t blast >100 messages at once
âœ… Build reputation first
âœ… Monitor analytics

Patience pays off!
